🎁【Perfect Gifts 2023 New Watch Car Toy】This watch is the perfect birthday present for boys and girls. This mini remote control car can greatly promote their development.

Why choose our watch remote control car？ Our remote control car is made of alloy material, crash and fall resistant, colorful lamp on the rear, 2.4Ghz signal with long control distance, cool and durable！

Play with the RC Remote Control Car for fun,Anytime & Anywhere This mini remote control car is designed to be so cute, easy to carry, you can play rc remote control car in indoor or outdoor. Simply press the forward/back button of the watch to easily control the infrared trolley distance of 30 meters. You can have a good time with your family and friends
